text:
@NYGovCuomo The CDC website says the death rate is continuing to decrease for the past 9 weeks.

04/18 - 16,357
06/20 - 906

What would you consider "getting worse"?

Throw some facts with links, don't just spew fear.

https://t.co/Vo0qVL8tvs
